snippet.title: Official Project Apidom trailer
snippet.description:
In excessive competition between factions, people of Pangea had awaken the Ancients. Devastating amounts of casualties made Tech and Brute factions to take desperate measures, hiding beneath reality and creating mechanical mind vessels called Apidoms, moving their concsiousness into them. Now, only way to return on the surface is in heavy armor and robotic body and scavenge for remaining resources and items.
—
Project Apidom is a free-to-play MOBA and RPG hybrid where players scavenge, and fight in arena battles. Build your character and become an unstoppable force while breaking the norms of usual MOBA games.
—
Add to wishlist on Steam: https://bit.ly/3NkMQg1
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/ProjectApidom
Check out our website: https://projectapidom.com/
